document_data.mainbody: Shaerl Amcathra ( The Lady of Shadowdale elbowed the assassin in the stomach and knocked him out with a punch. The stress of the fight caused her to go into labor shortly after. Luckily Elminster and his guest Foxilon Cardluck were there to aid with the babys delivery. The child was named Scothgar Amcathra or Scotti for short.
